Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Moreover , further ARSA alleles functionally similar to A464V might exist which , together with 0 - type mutations , may cause pathological ARSA and GS levels , but not clinical outbreak of the disease . .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| pathological ARSA and GS levels |
| the disease |

Note: I'm assuming that "pathological ARSA and GS levels" and "the disease" are referring to some kind of disease condition, even though they are not explicitly named.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| the disease |

Note: In the revised list, I have kept only "the disease" as a potential disease entity, as it is the only term that seems to unambiguously refer to a disease. The other phrase, "pathological ARSA and GS levels," is more likely to be a description of a condition rather than a specific disease.
